docs.text: Welcome ¶ Welcome to the W01verines Capture The Flag (CTF) organization! We are a global CTF team for all those who are Wolverines at heart, including Alumni, UMich Faculty and Staff, Ann Arbor students (UMich, high school, middle school, grade school), and Ann Arbor professionals. About ¶ This website will host our official documentation, which include resources, tools, tutorials, and other information relating to CTF participation. Stay tuned for upcoming changes. Stay in the Loop ¶ For bleeding-edge information and news, feel free to check out our Discord channel .
docs.title: Home

docs.text: CTF Writeups ¶ Writeups of CTF problems are an excellent way to learn and gain experience. A writeup is a step-by-step explanation of how a player solved a particular CTF problem. Players usually create and post these explanations 1-2 days after an event. It's often helpful to read several writeups for the same problem, as different players may use very different tools and methods for each challenge. Below are listed several databases containing writeups for past CTF problems. CTFtime Writeups . The official writeups page for CTFtime.Great resource for recent CTFs. CTFs on Github . This Github repo contains several years' worth of writeups.
docs.title: CTF Writeups

docs.text: Crypto Resources ¶ Info The list on this website will only be updated periodically. Visit the Discord #resources channel for a more up-to-date (and slightly less organized) list. Coursera course on crypto: https://www.coursera.org/learn/crypto Lots of crypto resources with some pwn: https://osandamalith.com/2019/02/11/linux-reverse-engineering-ctfs-for-beginners/ Crypto challenges: https://id0-rsa.pub/

docs.text: RULES & USER AGREEMENT ¶ Any actions and or activities related to the material contained within this discord is solely your responsibility. The misuse of the information in this website can result in criminal charges brought against the persons in question. The authors and w01verines members will not be held responsible in the event any criminal charges be brought against any individuals misusing the information on this server to break the law. This Discord server contains materials that can be potentially damaging or dangerous. Refer to the laws in your province/country before accessing, using, or in any other way utilizing these materials.These materials are for educational and research purposes only. Do not attempt to violate the law with anything contained here. If this is your intention, please leave this server. Neither administration of this server, the authors of this material, or anyone else affiliated in any way, is going to accept responsibility for your actions. Your usage of this discord constitutes your agreement to the following terms. All the information provided on this discord are for educational purposes only. w01verines is no way responsible for any misuse of the information. “w01verines" is a discord server related to Computer Security and not a site that promotes hacking / cracking / software piracy. This discord is totally meant for providing information on “Computer Security”, “Computer Programming” and other related topics and is no way related towards the terms “CRACKING” or “HACKING” (Unethical). All the information on this server is meant for developing Hacker Defense attitude among the users and help preventing the hack attacks. w01verines insists that these information shall not be used for causing any kind of damage directly or indirectly. However you may try these codes on your own computer at your own risk. The word “Hack” or “Hacking” that is used on this site shall be regarded as “Ethical Hack” or “Ethical Hacking” respectively. We believe only in White Hat Hacking. On the other hand we condemn Black Hat Hacking. We reserve the right to modify the Disclaimer at any time without notice. Some general final guidelines: We do not condone any sort of discrimination or hate speech on this server. Against ANY group. Whatsoever. Please limit the use of swear words in any language Please avoid discussions about alcohol or drugs as we would like to keep minors and high school students No posts, comments, profile names or picture that are pornographic or explicit Be excellent to each other. Activities on here count as team activities and we expect everyone to be treated with the same respect as in real life. Be active in the club and on the server! The more we communicate the more everyone will learn.
docs.title: Rules and User Agreement
